forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.
